title: Correction to: Tissue-Specific Silencing of Arabidopsis SU(VAR)3-9 HOMOLOG8 by miR171a
content: This is a correction to: Pablo A. Manavella, Daniel Koenig, Ignacio Rubio-Somoza, Hernán A. Burbano, Claude Becker, Detlef Weigel, Tissue-Specific Silencing of Arabidopsis SU(VAR)3-9 HOMOLOG8 by miR171a, Plant Physiology, Volume 161, Issue 2, February 2013, Pages 805–812, https://doi.org/10.1104/pp.112.207068
